com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate

Class LaunchEvaluationStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.LaunchEvaluationStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OfferEvaluationStage

    public class LaunchEvaluationStage
extends java.lang.Object
implements OfferEvaluationStage
    This class sets pod metadata on a org.apache.mesos.Protos.TaskInfo, ensuring that this metadata is available in the task's environment and creating a LaunchOfferRecommendation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LaunchEvaluationStage(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String taskSpecName, boolean shouldLaunch)
      Creates a new evaluation stage for launching a task.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EvaluationOutcome evaluate(MesosResourcePool mesosResourcePool, PodInfoBuilder podInfoBuilder)
      Evaluate the given offer (in the form of a MesosResourcePool, modifying the deducting used resources from the pool, and creating the appropriate EvaluationOutcome.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LaunchEvaluationStage

        public LaunchEvaluationStage(java.lang.String serviceName,
                             java.lang.String taskSpecName,
                             boolean shouldLaunch)
        Creates a new evaluation stage for launching a task.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The name of the service that's being launched into
        taskSpecName - The name of the task (as from the TaskSpec)
        shouldLaunch - Whether a Launch recommendation should actually be emitted. If false, then the StateStore will be updated with the resulting TaskInfo, but no launch will actually occur. This is used for updating local information about tasks

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public EvaluationOutcome evaluate(MesosResourcePool mesosResourcePool,
                                  PodInfoBuilder podInfoBuilder)
        Description copied from interface: OfferEvaluationStage
        Evaluate the given offer (in the form of a MesosResourcePool, modifying the deducting used resources from the pool, and creating the appropriate EvaluationOutcome.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface OfferEvaluationStage
        Parameters:
        mesosResourcePool - the available resources left available for this stage to consume
        podInfoBuilder - the grouping of all task and executor builders for the pod
        Returns:
        an EvaluationOutcome describing whether this evaluation stage succeeded or failed, and why
